div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2272 Tunisia, before 1935 Burial: mid 3rd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 73+ AE. From tomb excavated by Delattre Carthage: 50 Sicilian mint (as SNGCop. 94 [30]; 109 [20]) 11 Sardinian mint (as SNGCop. 144) 12 unc. lumps of agglomerated coins Disposition: Carthage Note by E. S. G. Robinson in BM
